property_info.legal_description: S½ of NE¼, Section 17, T28S, R37E, Brevard County, FL (per Plat Book 37, Page 200)

critical_constraint_discovered.description: 200-foot radius circular easement around City of Palm Bay supply well
critical_constraint_discovered.recorded: See survey annotation - radial easement for wellhead protection
critical_constraint_discovered.impact: SIGNIFICANT - reduces buildable area by approximately 50%
critical_constraint_discovered.resolution_timeline: ~10 years (per Tim Roberts, Palm Bay Utilities)
critical_constraint_discovered.source: Email from Tim Roberts to Mariam Shapira, September 11, 2025

initial_assessment.recommended_approach: Phased development with future rights agreement
initial_assessment.notes: Original multifamily concept must be redesigned around easement
